column1: #text=It was my mom 's birthday , so I decided to bake her a special cake .
#text=I looked in my cabinet and saw that I had everything except vanilla and frosting .
#text=I drove to the store and got the ingredients I needed and went back home .
#text=Once I was home I began mixing the cake ingredients together in a large bowl .
#text=Then I took out a cake sheet and poured the cake batter into it .
#text=I preheated the oven and placed the cake in the oven .
#text=I took out some butter and sugar and mixed them together adding a few more ingredients to taste as I went .
#text=I checked the cake and it was done .
#text=I took the cake out of the oven and let it cool .
#text=Then I frosted the cake and decorated it as well .
#text=After dinner my mom blew out the candles on the cake and everyone said how tasty it was to eat .
